feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 28. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
